Class ResController

java.lang.Object
main.ResController
public class ResController extends Object
The ResController class handles user interactions with the reservation management screen. It provides functionalities to add, update, delete, and search for reservations.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the choice box with reservation status values.

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation()
      Adds a new reservation to the system. Validates input fields before adding.

    • updateReservation

      public void updateReservation()
      Updates an existing reservation in the system. Validates input fields before updating.

    • deleteReservation

      public void deleteReservation()
      Deletes a reservation from the system. Validates the reservation ID before deletion.

    • searchReservation

      public void searchReservation()
      Searches for a reservation by its ID. Populates the fields with reservation details if found.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType)
      Displays an alert dialog with the specified title, message, and type.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert.
      message - the message to display in the alert.
      alertType - the type of the alert (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR).

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields and resets controls.

    • handleBackToDashboardButton

      public void handleBackToDashboardButton()
      Handles the "Back to Dashboard" button click event. Navigates back to the dashboard screen.

    • loadScene

      private void loadScene(String fxmlFile, String title)
      Loads a new screen based on the provided FXML file name and title.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - the name of the FXML file to load.
      title - the title of the new window.
